typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		O as (CIN as (row as (CATEGORY as string, CIN as string, CONFIGSETNAME as string, INDUSSTDCODE as string, MODNUMBER as integer, MODTITLE as string, MPNUMBER as string, MPTITLE as string, RANGE as string, STDCODE as string, TEAM_DISPLAY as string, VALIDITYTYPE as string, VALIDITYUPDATEDATE as date, VERSIONCODE as string)[]))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'xml',
	container: 'blob01',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true,
	wildcardPaths:['airbus/**/O_CIN.xml']) ~> OCIN
OCIN foldDown(unroll(O.CIN.row, O.CIN.row),
	mapColumn(
		CATEGORY = O.CIN.row.CATEGORY,
		CIN = O.CIN.row.CIN,
		CONFIGSETNAME = O.CIN.row.CONFIGSETNAME,
		INDUSSTDCODE = O.CIN.row.INDUSSTDCODE,
		MODNUMBER = O.CIN.row.MODNUMBER,
		MODTITLE = O.CIN.row.MODTITLE,
		MPNUMBER = O.CIN.row.MPNUMBER,
		MPTITLE = O.CIN.row.MPTITLE,
		RANGE = O.CIN.row.RANGE,
		STDCODE = O.CIN.row.STDCODE,
		TEAM_DISPLAY = O.CIN.row.TEAM_DISPLAY,
		VALIDITYTYPE = O.CIN.row.VALIDITYTYPE,
		VALIDITYUPDATEDATE = O.CIN.row.VALIDITYUPDATEDATE,
		VERSIONCODE = O.CIN.row.VERSIONCODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	postSQLs:['DROP TABLE IF EXISTS O_CIN_NORM_TEMP;

CREATE TABLE O_CIN_NORM_TEMP(
        CIN VARCHAR (500),
        MODNUMBER INTEGER,
        MODTITLE VARCHAR (500),
        MPNUMBER VARCHAR (500),
        MPTITLE VARCHAR (500),
        TEAM_DISPLAY VARCHAR (500),
        CATEGORY VARCHAR (500),
        CONFIGSETNAME VARCHAR (500),
        VALIDITYUPDATEDATE DATE,
        VALIDITYTYPE VARCHAR (500),
        INDUSSTDCODE VARCHAR (500),
        STDCODE VARCHAR (500),
        VERSIONCODE VARCHAR (500),
        RANGE VARCHAR (500),
        RANGE_START VARCHAR (500),
        RANGE_END VARCHAR (500),
);



DROP TABLE IF EXISTS O_CIN;
CREATE TABLE O_CIN(
        CIN VARCHAR (500),
        MODNUMBER INTEGER,
        MODTITLE VARCHAR (500),
        MPNUMBER VARCHAR (500),
        MPTITLE VARCHAR (500),
        TEAM_DISPLAY VARCHAR (500),
        CATEGORY VARCHAR (500),
        CONFIGSETNAME VARCHAR (500),
        VALIDITYUPDATEDATE DATE,
        VALIDITYTYPE VARCHAR (500),
        INDUSSTDCODE VARCHAR (500),
        STDCODE VARCHAR (500),
        VERSIONCODE VARCHAR (500),
        RANGE VARCHAR (20),
        RANGE_START INTEGER,
        RANGE_END INTEGER,
);


DECLARE @PCIN VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PMODNUMBER INTEGER
DECLARE @PMODTITLE VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PMPNUMBER VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PMPTITLE VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PTEAM_DISPLAY VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PCATEGORY VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PCONFIGSETNAME VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PVALIDITYUPDATEDATE DATE
DECLARE @PVALIDITYTYPE VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PINDUSSTDCODE VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PSTDCODE VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PVERSIONCODE VARCHAR (500)
DECLARE @PRANGE VARCHAR(8000)

DECLARE SPLIT_RANGE CURSOR LOCAL FAST_FORWARD FOR 
        SELECT
                CIN, MODNUMBER, MODTITLE, MPNUMBER, MPTITLE, TEAM_DISPLAY, CATEGORY, CONFIGSETNAME, 
                VALIDITYUPDATEDATE, VALIDITYTYPE, INDUSSTDCODE, STDCODE, VERSIONCODE, RANGE
        FROM [dbo].[O_CIN_TEMP]

OPEN SPLIT_RANGE
FETCH NEXT FROM SPLIT_RANGE 
INTO @PCIN, @PMODNUMBER, @PMODTITLE, @PMPNUMBER, @PMPTITLE, @PTEAM_DISPLAY, @PCATEGORY, @PCONFIGSETNAME, 
     @PVALIDITYUPDATEDATE, @PVALIDITYTYPE, @PINDUSSTDCODE, @PSTDCODE, @PVERSIONCODE, @PRANGE
 
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN

INSERT INTO O_CIN_NORM_TEMP
        SELECT @PCIN, @PMODNUMBER, @PMODTITLE, @PMPNUMBER, @PMPTITLE, @PTEAM_DISPLAY, @PCATEGORY, @PCONFIGSETNAME, 
                @PVALIDITYUPDATEDATE, @PVALIDITYTYPE, @PINDUSSTDCODE, @PSTDCODE, @PVERSIONCODE, 
                SPL.value, '', '' FROM STRING_SPLIT(@PRANGE,',') AS SPL
 
        FETCH NEXT FROM SPLIT_RANGE 
        INTO 
                @PCIN, @PMODNUMBER, @PMODTITLE, @PMPNUMBER, @PMPTITLE, @PTEAM_DISPLAY, @PCATEGORY, @PCONFIGSETNAME, 
                @PVALIDITYUPDATEDATE, @PVALIDITYTYPE, @PINDUSSTDCODE, @PSTDCODE, @PVERSIONCODE, @PRANGE
END 

INSERT INTO O_CIN
        SELECT CIN, 
        MODNUMBER, MODTITLE, MPNUMBER, MPTITLE, TEAM_DISPLAY, CATEGORY, CONFIGSETNAME, VALIDITYUPDATEDATE DATE, VALIDITYTYPE, INDUSSTDCODE, STDCODE, VERSIONCODE,        
        RANGE,
        CAST(SUBSTRING(RANGE, 1, CHARINDEX('-', RANGE) - 1) as INT) as RSTART,
        CAST(REVERSE( LEFT( REVERSE(RANGE), CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(RANGE))-1 ) ) AS INT) as REND
        From O_CIN_NORM_TEMP WHERE RANGE like '%-%'

INSERT INTO O_CIN
        SELECT CIN,
        MODNUMBER, MODTITLE, MPNUMBER, MPTITLE, TEAM_DISPLAY, CATEGORY, CONFIGSETNAME, VALIDITYUPDATEDATE, VALIDITYTYPE, INDUSSTDCODE, STDCODE, VERSIONCODE, 
        RANGE, CAST(RANGE as INT), ''
        From O_CIN_NORM_TEMP WHERE RANGE not like '%-%'

DROP TABLE O_CIN_NORM_TEMP;
DROP TABLE O_CIN_TEMP;


'],
	mapColumn(
		CATEGORY,
		CIN,
		CONFIGSETNAME,
		INDUSSTDCODE,
		MODNUMBER,
		MODTITLE,
		MPNUMBER,
		MPTITLE,
		RANGE,
		STDCODE,
		TEAM_DISPLAY,
		VALIDITYTYPE,
		VALIDITYUPDATEDATE,
		VERSIONCODE
	)) ~> OCINSINK

source(output(
		O as (DASSY as (row as (BESTMATURITYWEIGHT as double, BLANKCODE as string, BOUGHTOUTINDICATOR as boolean, CANCELLATION as boolean, CDATE as date, COMMENTS as string, CONSUMEROFTHEELEMENTCODE as string, CREATETIMESTAMP as date, DASSYISSUEINDEX as string, DASSYNUMBER as string, DEFEXPLOITATIONRESPONSIBLE as string, DESIGNSTATUS as string, DIRECTLINKTOEQ as boolean, DOMESTICTITLE as string, EFFECTIVEDATE as string, ENGLISHTITLE as string, FUNCTIONALCLASS as string, GENERALCODE as string, GEOGRAPHICALID as short, ICYNUMBER as string, ICYREFERENCE as string, IDENTIFIABLEPART as string, IDENTNUMBER as integer, INSTOCKIDENTICALPART as string, INTERCHANGEABILITYCODE as string, ITEMNUMBER as string, ITEMZONE as string, LOCATION as string, LOCK as boolean, LOCKINGRESPONSIBLE as string, LOGISTICCODE as string, MANUFACTURINGCODE as string, MANUFACTURINGRESPONSIBLE as string, MANUFINDEX as string, MARKING as string, MAXHEIGHT as string, MERFLAG as string, MODIFYTIMESTAMP as date, MORPHODIMENSIONALCODE as string, MORPHODIMENSIONALGROUP as string, NATCO as string, NATCOINDUS as string, NEEDDATE as string, NEGOCIATEDNEEDDATE as string, ORDINALNUMBER as string, PRODUCTIONTYPE as string, PROTECTIVETREATMENTCODE as string, SPAREITEM as boolean, SPECIALITYRESPONSIBLE as string, STATE as string, SURFACETYPE as string, TEAM_DISPLAY as string, TECHNOLOGICALCODE as string, UDATE as date, USEDASBLANK as boolean, USEDONDRAWING as string, VERSIONITERATION as string)[]))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'xml',
	container: 'blob01',
	folderPath: 'airbus/AIRBUS-RUAG-20200622-A320-XML-EZ20181205003-1-1',
	fileName: 'O_DASSY.xml',
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> ODASSY
ODASSY foldDown(unroll(O.DASSY.row, O.DASSY.row),
	mapColumn(
		BESTMATURITYWEIGHT = O.DASSY.row.BESTMATURITYWEIGHT,
		BLANKCODE = O.DASSY.row.BLANKCODE,
		BOUGHTOUTINDICATOR = O.DASSY.row.BOUGHTOUTINDICATOR,
		CANCELLATION = O.DASSY.row.CANCELLATION,
		CDATE = O.DASSY.row.CDATE,
		COMMENTS = O.DASSY.row.COMMENTS,
		CONSUMEROFTHEELEMENTCODE = O.DASSY.row.CONSUMEROFTHEELEMENTCODE,
		CREATETIMESTAMP = O.DASSY.row.CREATETIMESTAMP,
		DASSYISSUEINDEX = O.DASSY.row.DASSYISSUEINDEX,
		DASSYNUMBER = O.DASSY.row.DASSYNUMBER,
		DEFEXPLOITATIONRESPONSIBLE = O.DASSY.row.DEFEXPLOITATIONRESPONSIBLE,
		DESIGNSTATUS = O.DASSY.row.DESIGNSTATUS,
		DIRECTLINKTOEQ = O.DASSY.row.DIRECTLINKTOEQ,
		DOMESTICTITLE = O.DASSY.row.DOMESTICTITLE,
		EFFECTIVEDATE = O.DASSY.row.EFFECTIVEDATE,
		ENGLISHTITLE = O.DASSY.row.ENGLISHTITLE,
		FUNCTIONALCLASS = O.DASSY.row.FUNCTIONALCLASS,
		GENERALCODE = O.DASSY.row.GENERALCODE,
		GEOGRAPHICALID = O.DASSY.row.GEOGRAPHICALID,
		ICYNUMBER = O.DASSY.row.ICYNUMBER,
		ICYREFERENCE = O.DASSY.row.ICYREFERENCE,
		IDENTIFIABLEPART = O.DASSY.row.IDENTIFIABLEPART,
		IDENTNUMBER = O.DASSY.row.IDENTNUMBER,
		INSTOCKIDENTICALPART = O.DASSY.row.INSTOCKIDENTICALPART,
		INTERCHANGEABILITYCODE = O.DASSY.row.INTERCHANGEABILITYCODE,
		ITEMNUMBER = O.DASSY.row.ITEMNUMBER,
		ITEMZONE = O.DASSY.row.ITEMZONE,
		LOCATION = O.DASSY.row.LOCATION,
		LOCK = O.DASSY.row.LOCK,
		LOCKINGRESPONSIBLE = O.DASSY.row.LOCKINGRESPONSIBLE,
		LOGISTICCODE = O.DASSY.row.LOGISTICCODE,
		MANUFACTURINGCODE = O.DASSY.row.MANUFACTURINGCODE,
		MANUFACTURINGRESPONSIBLE = O.DASSY.row.MANUFACTURINGRESPONSIBLE,
		MANUFINDEX = O.DASSY.row.MANUFINDEX,
		MARKING = O.DASSY.row.MARKING,
		MAXHEIGHT = O.DASSY.row.MAXHEIGHT,
		MERFLAG = O.DASSY.row.MERFLAG,
		MODIFYTIMESTAMP = O.DASSY.row.MODIFYTIMESTAMP,
		MORPHODIMENSIONALCODE = O.DASSY.row.MORPHODIMENSIONALCODE,
		MORPHODIMENSIONALGROUP = O.DASSY.row.MORPHODIMENSIONALGROUP,
		NATCO = O.DASSY.row.NATCO,
		NATCOINDUS = O.DASSY.row.NATCOINDUS,
		NEEDDATE = O.DASSY.row.NEEDDATE,
		NEGOCIATEDNEEDDATE = O.DASSY.row.NEGOCIATEDNEEDDATE,
		ORDINALNUMBER = O.DASSY.row.ORDINALNUMBER,
		PRODUCTIONTYPE = O.DASSY.row.PRODUCTIONTYPE,
		PROTECTIVETREATMENTCODE = O.DASSY.row.PROTECTIVETREATMENTCODE,
		SPAREITEM = O.DASSY.row.SPAREITEM,
		SPECIALITYRESPONSIBLE = O.DASSY.row.SPECIALITYRESPONSIBLE,
		STATE = O.DASSY.row.STATE,
		SURFACETYPE = O.DASSY.row.SURFACETYPE,
		TEAM_DISPLAY = O.DASSY.row.TEAM_DISPLAY,
		TECHNOLOGICALCODE = O.DASSY.row.TECHNOLOGICALCODE,
		UDATE = O.DASSY.row.UDATE,
		USEDASBLANK = O.DASSY.row.USEDASBLANK,
		USEDONDRAWING = O.DASSY.row.USEDONDRAWING,
		VERSIONITERATION = O.DASSY.row.VERSIONITERATION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> ODASSYSINK
